lastLoginInstructions: Last time you signed in with
databaseSignUpInstructions:
Join Us

Do you or a relative of yours have prion disease? Tell us about it and join us making a difference...
Please fill out the form below to register. We will use this account to communicate with you regarding the Prion Registry.
forgotPasswordInstructions:
Forgot your password?

Please enter your email address and we will send you password reset instructions.
passwordTooltipText: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number, one upper case letter, and one lower case letter.
loginDescriptionText: You can log into the Prion Registry using your email account.
registerMessageText: Don't have an account? Join us here
successForgotPassword: If you have previously registered, please check your email to reset your password.
unrecoverableError: Something went wrong. Please contact technical support.

forgotPassword.too_many_requests: We're sorry. There are too many requests right now. Please reload the page and try again. If this persists, please try again later.
forgotPassword.lock.fallback: We're sorry, something went wrong when requesting the password change.

login.password_leaked: We have detected a potential security issue with this account. To protect your account, we have blocked this login. An email was sent with instruction on how to unblock your account.
login.too_many_attempts: Your account has been blocked after multiple consecutive login attempts.
login.lock.fallback: We're sorry, something went wrong when attempting to log in.
login.lock.network: We could not reach the server. Please check your connection and try again.
